Text:
I said that if enough seeders came online and I completed FLT X-COM Enemy Unknown release within a week, I would upload this Game.

It took close to 3 weeks to complete, but I uploaded it anyway!

I spent an hour $*%&#%@ around with WinRAR trying to get the icon and setup banner to change. They didn't so the release doesn't look as pretty as it could.
Nice, and it acutally works :) Been looking for this oldie for a  long time now ... Thank you :()=
